Zilliqa Mining Fact #1 Miners will only need to run the PoW process for the first 5 minutes of every ~1.5h cycle, which results in a lower electricity cost. Fact #2 It is possible to dual-mine Zilliqa and Ethereum, as PoW on Zilliqa is only for 5 minutes of every ~1.5h.
